name: Arcanine
AbilityText: As long as Arcanine has any Fire Energy attached to it, Arcanine has no Weakness.
Attack1Text: You may do 30 damage plus 30 more damage. If you do, Arcanine is now Burned.
Attack2Text: Discard a Fire Energy attached to Arcanine. This attack does 60 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Arcanine.

name: Bastiodon GL
Attack1Text: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Remove 1 damage counter from Bastiodon GL.

name: Darkrai G
AbilityText: Put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent's Pokemon that remains Asleep between turns.
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokemon already has any damage counters on it, that Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Floatzel GL
Attack1Text: Search your discard pile for up to 2 Supporter cards, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand.
Attack2Text: Floatzel GL can't use Giant Wave during your next turn.

name: Flygon
AbilityText: If any basic Energy card attached to Flygon is the same type as any of your Pokemon, the Retreat Cost for those Pokemon is 0.
Attack1Text: Discard a Stadium card your opponent has in play. If you do, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to Flygon during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: Does 60 damage plus 10 more damage for each Evolved Pokemon on your Bench.

name: Froslass GL
Attack1Text: Switch the Defending Pokemon with 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. The new Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon is affected by any Special Conditions, this attack does 30 damage plus 20 more damage. Then, remove all Special Conditions from the Defending Pokemon.

name: Jirachi
AbilityText: Once during your opponent's turn, if Jirachi would be Knocked Out by damage from an attack, you may search your deck for any 1 card and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack1Text: If you have a Supporter card in play, use the effect of that card as the effect of this attack.
Attack2Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poke-Powers, Poke-Bodies, or any other effects on the Defending Pokemon.

name: Lucario GL
AbilityText: Apply Weakness for each Pokemon (both yours and your opponent's) as x2 instead.
Attack1Text: Does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Luxray GL
Attack2Text: Discard an Energy card from your hand. (If you can't discard a card from your hand, this attack does nothing.)

name: Mismagius GL
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. If both of them are heads, discard all Energy attached to the Defending Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each Prize card your opponent has taken.

name: Rampardos GL
Attack1Text: Flip a coin for each Benched Pokemon (both yours and your opponent's). If that coin flip is heads, this attack does 30 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon has any damage counters on it, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Roserade GL
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned and can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon is affected by any Special Conditions, you may do 30 damage to any 1 Benched Pokemon instead. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Shiftry
AbilityText: As long as Shiftry is your Active Pokemon, whenever your opponent flips a coin during his or her turn, treat it as tails.
Attack1Text: If you have the same number of cards in your hand as your opponent, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon can't use any Poke-Powers or Poke-Bodies during your opponent's next turn.

name: Aggron
Attack1Text: If Aggron was damaged by an attack during your opponent's last turn, this attack does the same amount of damage done to Aggron to the Defending Pokemon.
Attack2Text: You may discard the top card of your deck. If you do, remove 2 damage counters and all Special Conditions from Aggron.

name: Beedrill
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for a Grass Pokemon, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can't be used if Beedrill is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed and Poisoned. Ignore this effect if any of your Pokemon used Needle Shock during your last turn.

name: Bronzong E4
Attack1Text: Each player shuffles his or her hand into his or her deck and draws up to 4 cards. (You draw your cards first.)
Attack2Text: If your opponent has only 1 Prize card left, this attack does 10 damage plus 50 more damage and the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Drapion E4
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Espeon E4
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Flareon
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may devolve Flareon and put Flareon into your hand. This power can't be used if Flareon is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack2Text: If Flareon evolved from Eevee during this turn, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage and the Defending Pokemon is now Burned.

name: Gallade E4
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon that has any damage counters on it. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.

name: Gastrodon East Sea
AbilityText: If Gastrodon East Sea is switched or retreats to your Bench, move as many Energy cards attached to Gastrodon East Sea as you like to the new Active Pokemon.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 2 Gastrodon and put them onto your Bench as Basic Pokemon. Put 2 damage counters on each of them. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Gastrodon West Sea
Attack2Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokemon and 10 damage to each of your opponent's other Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Golem E4
Attack1Text: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Golem GL.
Attack2Text: Golem E4 does 60 damage to itself.

name: Heracross E4
Attack1Text: During your next turn, Heracross E4's Megahorn attack's base damage is 100.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Hippowdon
AbilityText: As long as Hippowdon is your Active Pokemon, put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent's Pokemon LV.X between turns.
Attack1Text: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to Hippowdon. Before doing damage, you may search your discard pile for a Fighting Energy card and attach it to Hippowdon.
Attack2Text: Does 10 damage to each Benched Pokemon that isn't an Evolved Pokemon (both yours and your opponent's). (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon).

name: Jolteon
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may devolve Jolteon and put Jolteon into your hand. This power can't be used if Jolteon is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 30 more damage.
Attack2Text: If Jolteon evolved from Eevee during this turn, this attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon).

name: Mamoswine GL
AbilityText: As long as Mamoswine GL is your Active Pokemon, put 1 damage counter on each Active Pokemon (excluding Water Pokemon) (both yours and your opponent's) between turns.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Mr. Mime E4
Attack1Text: Flip 3 coins. Remove a number of damage counters equal to the number of heads from your Pokemon in any way you like.
Attack2Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Mr. Mime E4 by attacks is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Nidoking
AbilityText: If your Active Pokemon is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if that Pokemon is Knocked Out), put 2 damage counters on the Attacking Pokemon. You can't put more than 2 damage counters in this way.
Attack1Text: If your opponent has any Benched Pokemon, this attack's base damage is 30 instead of 60 and this attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. If both of them are tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Nidoqueen
AbilityText: At any times between turns, remove 1 damage counter from each of your Pokemon. You can't use more than 1 Maternal Comfort Poke-Body between turns.
Attack2Text: Does 50 damage plus 10 more damage for each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon.

name: Raichu GL
Attack1Text: Choose 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. This attack does 10 damage to each of them. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: Does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon that has any damage counters on it.

name: Rhyperior E4
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.
Attack2Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.

name: Snorlax
Attack1Text: Search your discard pile for up to 4 basic Energy cards, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, both Snorlax and the Defending Pokemon are now Asleep. If tails, Snorlax is now Asleep.

name: Vaporeon
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may devolve Vaporeon and put Vaporeon into your hand. This power can't be used if Vaporeon is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon that has any damage counters on it. This attack does 40 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) If Vaporeon evolved from Eevee during this turn, this attack does 60 damage instead.

name: Vespiquen E4
AbilityText: When you attach a Grass Energy card from your hand to Vespiquen E4, remove 1 damage counter from Vespiquen E4.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin for each Grass Energy attached to Vespiquen E4. This attack does 30 damage plus 20 more damage for each heads.

name: Walrein
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), when you play Walrein from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokemon, you may attach as many Water Energy cards from your hand to Walrein as you like.
Attack1Text: Discard an Energy card attached to Walrein and then discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Yanmega E4
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 10 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon.

name: Alakazam E4
Attack1Text: Discard a Psychic Energy attached to Alakazam E4 and remove 4 damage counters from Alakazam E4.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Electrode G
Attack1Text: This attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) Electrode G does 100 damage to itself.
Attack2Text: Move an Energy card attached to Electrode G to 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Gengar GL
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Confused.
Attack2Text: Put 3 damage counters on 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. You may shuffle Gengar GL and all cards attached to it back into your deck.

name: Glaceon
AbilityText: As long as Glaceon is your Active Pokemon, any damage done to your Pokemon by your opponent's attacks is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: If your opponent doesn't discard a card from his or her hand, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Hippowdon E4
AbilityText: If Hippowdon E4 has any Fighting Energy attached to it, any damage done to Hippowdon E4 by attacks is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each heads.

name: Infernape E4
Attack1Text: Choose 2 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 20 damage to each of them. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Lairon
Attack1Text: Flip a coin for each Metal Energy attached to Lairon. This attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage for each heads.
Attack2Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Lairon by attacks is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Leafeon
AbilityText: As long as Leafeon is your Active Pokemon, whenever you attach an Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Pokemon, remove 2 damage counters from that Pokemon.
Attack1Text: Attach a basic Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Pokemon.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Machamp GL
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokemon is an Evolved Pokemon, this attack does 30 damage plus 20 more damage.
Attack2Text: Put the Defending Pokemon and all cards attached to it on top of your opponent's deck. Your opponent shuffles his or her deck afterward. (If your opponent doesn't have any Benched Pokemon, this attack does nothing.)

name: Rapidash E4
Attack1Text: Flip 3 coins. For each heads, search your discard pile for a basic Energy card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand.

name: Scizor E4
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Sharpedo
AbilityText: If Sharpedo is your Active Pokemon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if Sharpedo is Knocked Out), flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy card attached to the Attacking Pokemon.
Attack1Text: If an attack does damage to the Defending Pokemon (after applying Weakness and Resistance), that attack does 40 more damage to that Pokemon until the end of your next turn.

name: Starmie
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your discard pile for a Water Energy card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. This power can't be used if Starmie is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: If Starmie and the Defending Pokemon have the same amount of Energy attached to them, remove 4 damage counters from Starmie.
Attack2Text: Starmie can't attack during your next turn.

name: Steelix GL
Attack1Text: Search your discard pile for a Metal Energy card and attach it to Steelix GL. If you do, remove 1 damage counter from Steelix GL.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 50 more damage and the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Tropius
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing. If heads, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to Tropius during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: Remove all damage counters from 1 of your Benched Grass Pokemon.

name: Vibrava
Attack1Text: Does 20 damage times the number of Energy cards in your opponent's discard pile. Then, put those Energy cards on top of your opponent's deck. Your opponent shuffles his or her deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage.

name: Whiscash E4
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: Does 10 damage to each of your Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Aerodactyl GL
Attack1Text: Draw 2 cards.
Attack2Text: Your opponent can't play any Pokemon from his or her hand to Evolve or to Level-Up the Defending Pokemon during his or her next turn.

name: Ambipom G
Attack1Text: Move an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokemon to another of your opponent's Pokemon.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon has any Energy cards attached to it, this attack's base damage is 20 instead of 60.

name: Aron
Attack1Text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

name: Carvanha
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon can't attack or retreat during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Eevee
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 2 cards that evolve from Eevee, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Switch Eevee with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Flareon E4
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard a Fire Energy attached to Flareon .

name: Forretress G
Attack1Text: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) Forretress G can't use Shell Scatter during your next turn.
Attack2Text: Does 10 damage to each Benched Pokemon (both yours and your opponent's). (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.) Flip a coin. If tails, Forretress G does 80 damage to itself.

name: Gliscor E4
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 30 more damage. If tails, the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Growlithe
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Fire Energy card and attach it to Growlithe. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Growlithe does 10 damage to itself.

name: Hippopotas
Attack1Text: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage plus 20 more damage for each heads.

name: Houndoom E4
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Burned.

name: Kakuna
AbilityText: Any damage done to Kakuna by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned. Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for an Evolution card that evolves from Kakuna and put it onto Kakuna. (This counts as evolving Kakuna.) Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Kecleon
AbilityText: Kecleon's type is Grass Fire Water Lightning Psychic Fighting Darkness Metal Colorless.
Attack1Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage for each heads.

name: Koffing
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused and Poisoned.
Attack2Text: Koffing does 30 damage to itself, and don't apply Weakness and Resistance to this damage.

name: Munchlax
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Snorlax from your hand onto Munchlax (this counts as evolving Munchlax) and remove all damage counters from Munchlax.
Attack1Text: Remove all Special Conditions and 6 damage counters from Munchlax. Munchlax is now Asleep.

name: Munchlax
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Snorlax from your hand onto Munchlax (this counts as evolving Munchlax) and remove all damage counters from Munchlax.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Trainer card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Nidoran ♀
Attack2Text: Search your deck for a Supporter card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Nidoran ♂
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon can't attack during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Nidorina
Attack1Text: Nidorina does 10 damage to itself, and don't apply Weakness and Resistance to this damage.
Attack2Text: If Nidorina has any damage counters on it, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage and the Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Nidorino
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned. Put 2 damage counters instead of 1 on the Defending Pokemon between turns.
Attack2Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon that doesn't have any damage counters on it. This attack does 40 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Nuzleaf
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokemon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.
Attack2Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokemon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poke-Powers, Poke-Bodies, or any other effects on that Pokemon.

name: Quagsire GL
AbilityText: As long as Quagsire GL is on your Bench, prevent all damage done to Quagsire GL by attacks (both yours and your opponent's).
Attack1Text: You may switch Quagsire GL with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Sealeo
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 2 Water Energy cards, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon can't attack during your opponent's next turn.

name: Seedot
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, if Seedot would be damaged by an attack, prevent that attack's damage done to Seedot if that damage is 40 or less.
Attack2Text: Choose 1 card from your opponent's hand without looking. Look at that card you chose, then have your opponent shuffle that card into his or her deck.

name: Shellos East Sea
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent's Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon that has any damage counters on it. This attack does 20 damage to that Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Shellos West Sea
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. Choose 1 of your Pokemon. For each heads, remove 1 damage counter from that Pokemon.

name: Snorlax
AbilityText: As long as Snorlax is Asleep, your opponent's Active Pokemon can't retreat.
Attack1Text: If Snorlax is Asleep, this attack does 20 damage plus 30 more damage. (This attack can be used even if Snorlax is Asleep.)
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 damage plus 40 more damage. If tails, Snorlax is now Asleep.

name: Spheal
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Staryu
Attack1Text: If your opponent has any Evolved Pokemon in play, draw 3 cards.
Attack2Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poke-Powers, Poke-Bodies, or any other effects on the Defending Pokemon.

name: Trapinch
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Trapinch is your Active Pokemon, you may search your discard pile for a basic Fighting Energy card and attach it to Trapinch.
Attack1Text: Does 10 damage times the amount of Energy attached to Trapinch.

name: Turtwig GL
AbilityText: As long as Turtwig GL's remaining HP is 60 or less, each of Turtwig GL's attacks does 30 more damage to the Defending Pokemon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: After your attack, remove from Turtwig GL the number of damage counters equal to the damage you did to the Defending Pokemon.

name: Weedle
Attack1Text: Search your discard pile for up to 5 Pokemon, show them to your opponent, and shuffle them into your deck.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.

name: Weezing
AbilityText: If Weezing is Confused and is Knocked Out, your opponent can't take a Prize card.
Attack1Text: Count the number of damage counters on Weezing. Put that many damage counters on the Defending Pokemon and Weezing is now Confused.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Fan Rotom
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may use this power. Fan Rotom's type is Colorless until the end of your turn.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent returns the Defending Pokemon and all cards attached to it to his or her hand.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard an Energy attached to Fan Rotom.

name: Frost Rotom
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may use this power. Frost Rotom's type is Water until the end of your turn.
Attack1Text: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: Does 40 damage plus 10 more damage for each Colorless Energy in the Defending Pokemon's Retreat Cost (after applying effects to the Retreat Cost).

name: Heat Rotom
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may use this power. Heat Rotom's type is Fire until the end of your turn.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Fire Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Benched Pokemon. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon is now Burned.

name: Mow Rotom
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may use this power. Mow Rotom's type is Grass until the end of your turn.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy card attached to each of your opponent's Pokemon.

name: Wash Rotom
AbilityText: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may use this power. Wash Rotom's type is Water until the end of your turn.
Attack1Text: Remove 3 damage counters from each of your Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin until you get tails. For each heads, choose 1 card from your opponent's hand without looking and discard it.
